title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 350.2 - Reserves
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 350.2 - Reserves

State Regulations

After release of funds held in escrow pursuant to Public Health Law section 4610, the operator of a continuing care retirement community operating under a certificate of authority pursuant to Public Health Law article 46 shall maintain a reserve liability for amounts due and unpaid and a reserve liability for estimated future capital, operating and refund expenses provided for under the terms of the continuing care retirement contracts and continuing care at home contracts.
